oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Domestic Fair Trade – Principles and Business
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schumacher, Jörg
Eichert, Christian
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Consumer issues
Social aspects
Produce chain management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
The presentation introduces into the state of the art of Domestic Fair Trade.
The presentation reflects on the background and current trends in respect to sustainability, refers to the combination Sustainability & Organic Farming, introduces concepts and understanding of fairness in the mid-European context, and ends up with some practical examples and initiatives in Central Europe
